mapper.select: select t.title as productTitle, t.cover_url as productCover, t.store_id, r.voucher_id as productId from voucher_order r inner join `order` t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.id = #{orderId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo} and t.deleted = false

select t.order_no, r.cover_url, r.title, r.verify_no, r.pay_type, r.refund_type, r.refund_state, m.title as restaurantName, t.restaurant_id, r.price, r.discount_amount, r.num, r.state, r.pay_amount, r.create_time, r.pay_time, r.mobile, r.nick_name, t.valid_days, t.effect_date, t.expire_date, t.effect_time, t.expire_time, r.complete_time, r.remark from `order` r inner join voucher_order t on t.order_no = r.order_no left join restaurant m on t.restaurant_id = m.id where t.deleted = false and r.member_id = #{memberId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo}

select t.order_no, r.cover_url, r.title, r.pay_type, r.refund_type, r.refund_state, m.title as restaurantName, t.restaurant_id, r.price, r.discount_amount, r.num, t.use_num, r.state, r.pay_amount, r.create_time, r.pay_time, r.mobile, r.nick_name, t.valid_days, t.effect_date, t.expire_date, t.effect_time, t.expire_time, r.complete_time, r.remark from `order` r inner join voucher_order t on t.order_no = r.order_no left join restaurant m on t.restaurant_id = m.id where t.deleted = false and r.order_no = #{orderNo}
and r.merchant_id = #{merchantId}
